name: Accept Stripe Donation and Payments – AidWP
author: HM Plugin

sections.description:
AidWP is the Stripe Donation and Payments Plugin that allows you to collect donations or payments with credit cards via Stripe payment gateway.

What makes this donation plugin powerful is its usability. After installation and some quick settings, you can start accepting donations via Stripe payment gateway.

✅ Accept Stripe Donations

In this stripe donation plugin with some simple steps you can place a donation form in any page. Donors can use their credit card to donate money.

✅ Collect Stripe Payments

With this stripe payment plugin you can place a payment form in any page where you want to collect payment. Buyers can use their credit card to make a payment.

✅ Trusted Gateway

Millions of companies of all sizes use Stripe’s software and APIs to accept payments. A fully integrated suite of payments products.

Live Demo | Upgrade to Pro! | Live Chat | Support

How donation/payment form works!:

🌟 Plugin Features:

  • Easy to install
  • Works with any WordPress theme
  • Fully Responsive
  • Shortcoded
  • Minimal settings required
  • Super Easy and Fast
  • Accept donation via Stripe payment
  • Donors List Panel
  • 150+ Currency Available
  • Two types of email integrated: Admin and Receipient
  • 5 Template Colors
  • Strong Customer Authentication (SCA) supports for European customers

🌟 Form Features:

  • Form Title
  • Form Description
  • Form Banner
  • Dropdown ‘Donation For’ Options
  • Set various Donation Amounts
  • Show/Hide Banner
  • Upload Banner
  • Show/Hide Form Labels
  • Customizable Form Labels
  • Customizable Form Button

🌟 Receipt Email Settings:

  • Customizable Email Subject
  • Customizable Email Heading
  • Customizable Email Footnote

👍 Customizable Thank You Page:

A good business practice is say thank you to your new and returning customers. A good thank you quote or message will help build that strong customer loyalty that keeps your business afloat.

This donation plugin provides a built in ‘Thank You’ page which can be customize with Elementor.

➡️ Useage of Shortcode:⬅️

To display donation form use the below shortcode in any page 

 [wp_stripe_donation]

🌟 Pro Features – Basic:

  • Show-Hide ‘Donation For’ From Form
  • Enable-Disable Admin Notice Email
  • Enable-Disable Receipt Email
  • Receipt Email From Name Option
  • Receipt Email From Email Option
  • Display All Donations in Donation List Panel
  • Ability to Delete Test Data From Donation List Panel
  • Apply Donation For From Url

🌟 Pro Features – Professional:

  • Can Be Use For Fundraising
  • Donor Address Fields Available
  • Export Donation Data to CSV and Excel
  • Google reCaptcha Integrated
  • Number Matching Captcha to Prevent Bot Attack
  • Donor Comments Field Available
  • Apply a Condition to the Donors
  • Receipt Email in HTML Foramat
  • Display Donor List With Shortocode
  • Customed “Thank You” Page
  • Delete Data From Donation List Panel
  • Set Form Width Option
  • 3 Form Header Options Available
  • Form Button Width Option Available
  • Form Border Width, Color, Radius
  • Form Padding, Font Color, Background Color Option Available
  • Form Input Border Width, Color, Radius Option Available
  • Form Input Font Color and Size Option Available
  • Form Input Padding Option Available
  • Form Input Background Color Option Option Available
  • Display Total Donation Today
  • Form Button Background, Font Color Option Available
  • Enable disable receipt email from stripe
  • Receipt Email Greeting Message Option Available
  • Multi Panel Donation Form For Better View

Get the pro

SCA supports for European customers:

📋 Translation Ready:

  • POT file included (/languages/)
  • Bengoli
  • French (France)
  • Spanish (Spain)

👍 Give us a Feedback/Rating

sections.installation:
Install AidWP as a regular WordPress plugin. Here are different ways to install plugin:

Install by search plugin:

  1. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  2. Search WP Stripe Donation
  3. Click to install
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Setup the proper settings in WP Stripe Donation menu

Install by upload plugin:

  1. Download the latest version of WP Stripe Donation(.zip file)
  2. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  3. Select “Upload Plugin”
  4. Click on “Choose File”
  5. Select downloaded wp-stripe-donation.zip and click on “Install Now” button
  6. Activate the plugin
sections.faq:
How can I Display the Donation Form?

After activating the plugin, you will see “WP Stripe Donation” in WordPress Admin Dashboard.

Firstly, Go to “Key Settings” and add your stripe keys which you will get from your stripe account (See attached video).

Secondly, Create a page and name it as you wish like “Donation”

Finally, Put the shortcode [wp_stripe_donation] in that page and Update it.

You will see your donation form on that page.

How can I Display Multiple Amounts?

This is very easy.

Go to “General Settings” and you will see an option “Amounts” there.

Put your amounts like “5,10,50,100,500,100” and you will see them in the form.

How can I Change the Currency?

Go to “General Settings” and you will see an option “Currency” there.

Select your Currency from the drop down and save it.

You will see it immediately in the amount section in the donation form.

Can I use this for multiple donation items or product items?

Yes, you can do it.

Go to “General Settings” and you will see an option “Donation For Options” there.

Put your items like “Item One,Item Two,Item Three” and you will see them in the form drop down section.

sections.reviews:
Helped fix right away when I had an issue

By lukeskybaker on January 22, 2024

Support was excellent, I had an issue (of my own making turns out) and the developer jumped on chat right away, troubleshooted, and fixed really quick and now it works just fine. Thank you!

Worst ever!!!

By dwkinkead on November 16, 2023

Please, please read this. This plugin is the absolute worst plugin I have ever used. Please take my advice and do not purchase it -- you will regret it. Not enough space here to write about all the problems. All these other reviews must be from friends of the developer.
Also, there is no recurring donation feature, so what's the point?

Truly First Rate

By apendrag0n3 on September 7, 2023

Not only does the plug-in do EXACTLY what I need - but the support I have received is above-and-beyond what I expected!

Amazing support!!

By reubencross on August 9, 2023

This plugin does exactly what I require with simplicity and elegance. But above all, the customer support is amazing!! Thank you Hossni!!!

Great and super fast support

By emmatrizero on August 9, 2023

Fast and great support.

Will solve your problems rapidly and with kindness.

Plugin works fine and really good solution for stripe donations.

Great plugin - Excellent Support

By assipattle on January 5, 2023

Apart form being a great plugin, Hosni managed to solve an issue for us almost immediately. Briliant support is almost as important as the plugin. Hosni has both. Highly recommended.

Excelent help!

By biedribampp on September 16, 2022

I had a problem with donation amount, but Hossni solved a problem in 5 minutes with css code and pictures where put this code. It worked! For a moment felt as programmer :D :D Thanks a lot! Very professional and fast support. I like this plugin because it's simple and now I like it more because of such excelent support :)

Hossni is great and a great support guy

By ahsanahmed007 on March 30, 2022

believe me i can't see any support person like you... you are great you are so good buddy... Allah bless you and gives you many many more..

Works perfectly

By mikejcsmith on March 26, 2022

Plugin works perfectly, after solving a conflict with Stripe/Woocommerce. I had checked that box in General Settings, but unchecking that box helped in my case. Also worth re-checking a correct copy-paste of your API keys :) Thanks for the prompt help on FB Messenger. Very much appreciated. Great support!

Amazing support

By aoife1 on February 16, 2022

I went onto their website and spoke directly with someone (Hossni) who was so helpful and fixed my issue in 2 minutes. Hossni was so nice and patient and I can't get over the free support. I will be using the plugin again and recommending the paid plugin to clients! Amazing!
